paper_abstract: The paper explores web reasoning based on Resolution with Partial Intersection and Truncation (PT-resolution). Instead of the traditional reasoning mechanism which is based on back-tracking and pattern matching, PT-resolution reasons based on set calculations. It prevents a derivation on a finite logic program from infinite looping and therefore, is ideal for web reasoning. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A semantic approach for web reasoning
